garden_desc: A versatile hospitality property in the heart of Scanno, nestled in the soul of Abruzzo.
garden_location: From the historic center of Scanno
garden_text1:
The Garden Hotel represents a unique opportunity in the heart of Abruzzo: a historic accommodation facility, well-distributed and ready to be relaunched or transformed according to new needs.



Thanks to its versatility, the structure lends itself to numerous alternative uses: tourist residence, retirement home for self-sufficient elderly people, health residence, wellness center or SPA, apartment complex for sale or rent.



Born as a three-star hotel in 1964, it has been the subject of numerous expansions and modernizations until it achieved the four-star classification in 1996, remaining the only hotel of this category in Scanno.



The structure was managed continuously until a few years ago and is currently in good general condition, although it requires system updates and partial but not structural renovation work.

garden_rooms.title: Hospitality
garden_rooms.description: The accommodation capacity reaches up to 90 beds, distributed in single, double, triple, quadruple rooms and suites/apartments, for a total of 36 rooms. All the furnishings in the rooms are handcrafted in solid walnut wood.

garden_spaces.title: Common spaces
garden_spaces.description: The Garden Hotel also has large common areas: reception, hall, bar, restaurant rooms, breakfast room, games and entertainment rooms.

garden_restaurant.title: Restaurant
garden_restaurant.description: The dining area can accommodate up to 300 people between the restaurant, porch and atrium. The hotel also has a large professional kitchen.

garden_service.title: Service rooms
garden_service.description: The hotel has some service rooms and technical rooms, including industrial laundry, boiler room, warehouse and changing rooms.

garden_parking.title: Parking
garden_parking.description: Immediately outside the hotel there is also a private car park with 25-30 spaces, also accessible to coaches.

garden_outdoor.title: Outdoor spaces
garden_outdoor.description: Among the outdoor spaces, there is a panoramic garden on two levels, terraces, balconies, and a small terrace/solarium.

garden_position.title: Strategic position
garden_position.description: The property is located in a strategic position, adjacent to the public gardens and well connected to the main services, schools and public transport.

garden_surroundings.title: In the surroundings
garden_surroundings.description: The historic center can be reached on foot in a few minutes, while Lake Scanno is just over 2 km away.

garden_kitchen_zone1.title: Kitchen Areas
garden_kitchen_zone1.description: The kitchen is divided into various rooms, for a total of 150 m²:

garden_kitchen_zone2.title: Cooking Area
items: single-plate stove with two ovens fueled by diesel
two extractor hoods that cover all the hobs with an effective extraction system complete with motor and exhaust flue on the roof

garden_kitchen_zone3.title: Refrigeration
garden_kitchen_zone3.description: The kitchen is also equipped with:
items: an additional cold room for fine wines
two column refrigerators for bottles in the restaurant room
an ice cream display case in the restaurant room

garden_potential_description: The complex shape and multiple levels also allow for a different use of the building. The structure can be easily transformed for different internal distributions. Take a look at the possible redevelopments of the Garden Hotel.

garden_potential_items.title: Expansion
garden_potential_items.content: The General Regulatory Plan (PGR) allows for the possibility of expanding the existing gross usable area by 10%.

garden_potential_items.title: Socio-health use
garden_potential_items.content: The Garden Hotel is very suitable due to its position, layout and territorial location to be transformed into a tourist residence for the elderly, a rest home for self-sufficient people or a nursing home.

garden_potential_items.title: Residential use
garden_potential_items.content: The structure could also be used for residential purposes. In particular, it could be used for civilian housing and appurtenances. The apartments that can be built are about 25. Alternatively, a residence could be created for apartments for rent or sale.

garden_potential_items.title: Tourist-receptive use
garden_potential_items.content: The current tourist-receptive use is maintainable and could also be expanded or modified. The presence of many rooms used and necessary in the past for banquets could result in an increase in accommodation, transforming the rooms into bedrooms or creating services such as gyms, digital entertainment rooms, wellness centers/SPA.
